verses.content: Chun, ka hang en a, Berâmte chu Zion Tlânga ngîrin le an chala a hming le a Pa hming ziek, mi nuoi khat le sîng li le sâng li a kuoma chun an um a.
Chun, vâna inthawka rawl ri, tui tamtak ri ang le, vâninrûm ri nasatak ri ang, ka hriet a; chun, ka ri hriet chu ṭingṭang keituhaiin an ṭingṭang an kei ri ang a na,

lalṭhungpha hmaa le, thilhring pali le upahai hmaa chun hla thar ni âwmtak hi an sak a; chun, hnuoia inthawka intlan tah, mi nuoi khat le sîng li le sâng li chau naw khan chu, tûkhawmin chu hla chu an inchûk thei nawh.

Chuonghai chu nuhmeia insuk- thiengnaw nawhai chu an nih; nunghâk inthieng ang an ni sih a. Chuong chu Berâmte a fena taphawta zuituhai chu an nih. Chuong chu Berâmte le Pathien ta dinga ra hma- satak ni dinga mihriem laia inthawka intlan suok an nih.
An baua khêl a suok hrim miin an hriet ngai nawh, sawisêlbo an ni sih a.
Chun, hnuoia umhai kuoma le, hnam tinrêng dâm, chi tinrêng dâm, ṭawng tinrêng dâm kuoma tlângin- sampui dinga chatuon Chanchin Ṭha nei vântirko dang vânlaizâwla vuong ka hmuh a;
Ama chun rawl inringtakin, “A rorêl hun chu a hung tlung ta leiin Pathien chu ṭi unla, chawimawi ro; vân dâm, hnuoi dâm, tuisuoriet dâm, tui hnâr dâm siemtu chu chibai bûk ro,” a tih a.
Chun, vântirko dang, a pahnina chun, “Babulon khaw ropui, a mi dit chîngna leia lunginsenna uoiin hnam po po indâwntirtu chu, a tlâwm tah!” tiin a hung zui a.
Chun, vântirko dang, a pathum- na chun rawl inringtakin, “Tû- khawmin Sahrâng le a lim chibai bûkin a chala manih, a kuta manih inchikna a nei chun, chu mi ngei chun Pathien lunginsenna uoiin,
a lunginsenna noa iengkhawm pawl loa siem chu dâwn a ta, vântirko inthienghai mithmua le Berâmte mithmua chun mei le kâta sawisakin um bawk a tih.

Chun, chuong mihai sawisakna meikhu chu chatuonin hang fêng a ta; Sahrâng le a lim chibai bûktuhai, a hming inchikna nei taphawthai khawm chun, a sûn a zânin châwl hrim nei naw ni hai,” tiin anni chu a hung zui a.
Hitaka hin mi inthieng Pathien thupêkhai le Isu ringna thu zâwm- tuhai selna inlang theina a um.

Chun, vâna inthawkin rawlin, “Hienghin ziek rawh: Tuta hnung chu mithi, Lalpaa thihai chu, an hamṭha. Thlarau chun, ‘Anih, an sinin- rimnahai chu châwl san tâng an tih; an thilthawhai chun a hung zui ve ding a ni sih a,’ a tih,” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, ka hang en a, sûm vâr tak ka hmuh a. Sûm chunga chun mihriem naupa ang tak hi, rângka- chak lallukhum khuma, kâwite ngei- tak chawia ṭhung ka hmu bawk a.

Chun, vântirko dang, Pathien biekina inthawkin a hung suok a, sûm chunga ṭhung kuoma chun rawl inringtakin, “I kâwite kha keidawk la, ât rawh; ât a hun ta sih a; hnuoi bu khu a ngui zo tah khu,” a ta.
Chuongchun, sûm chunga ṭhung chun a kâwite chu hnuoiah a thlâk a, hnuoi bu chu an ât tah a.
Chun, vântirko dang vâna Pathien biekina inthawkin a hung suok nâwk a, ama khawm chun kâwite ngeitak a chawi bawk a.

Chun, vântirko dang, mei chunga thuneitu chu, mâichâma inthawkin a hung suok nâwk a; chun, ama chun rawl inringtakin, “I kâwite ngeitak kha keidawk la, hnuoia grêp hrui ra bâwrhai khu zu ât rawh, grêp rahai khu a hmin ṭuo ta khu,” tiin kâwite ngeitak chawitu chu a ko a.
Chuongchun, vântirko chun a kâwite chu hnuoiah a thlâk a, hnuoia grêp ra chu a ât a, grêp sâwrna khur lientak, Pathien lunginsenna grêp sâwrna khura chun a the lût a.
Chun, khaw puo tienga grêp sâwrna khura chun a sir sâwr a, chuongchun, grêp sâwrna khura inthawk chun thisen a hung suok a, fîng sîng khat le za ruk chen sakawr- hai thîrbar chena inthûk a nih.
